title: Wendy Neary
deck: I am married to Simon (whose willingness to listen to me is second to none!) and have two amazing teenage daughters, Jess and Rachel. I work as the Centre Manager at Gateway, and take care of the finances of the Church, ably supported by Karen Donkin. This involves a wide variety of roles, tasks and interactions making for a busy, sometimes bizarre, but wonderful working life. I am so grateful to have found such a sense of belonging and fulfilment as part of the Gateway Church family.
